message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth $150 to us. Considering its value and quality, I propose we start our negotiation at $120. Let me know what you think!

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on your product, but $120 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm willing to pay $85 for it, which I think is a fair price considering my maximum budget. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. Based on our discussion, I would like to offer the product to you for $95. This is a price that reflects both the value of the product and your budget constraints. I hope this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $95 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $90, which I think is a fair compromise. Let's make a deal!

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I'm glad we're making progress. Considering the value of the product and your budget, I propose we finalize the deal at $92. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between our positions. I hope you agree, and we can move forward with the transaction.
